chapter.title: Deployment plan
chapter.para: Peergreen Plaftom supports JOnASâ€™s deployment plan enabling to deploy in one unit a whole set of application modules. Concretely a deployment plan is an XML file with a sorted list of modules to deploy. The modules can be retrieved from maven repositories as illustrated in the following example :
chapter.programlisting:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <deployment-plan xmlns="http://jonas.ow2.org/ns/deployment-plan/1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:m2="http://jonas.ow2.org/ns/deployment-plan/maven2/1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://jonas.ow2.org/ns/deployment-plan/1.0 http://jonas.ow2.org/ns/deployment-plan/1.0/deployment-plan-1.0.xsd http://jonas.ow2.org/ns/deployment-plan/maven2/1.0 http://jonas.ow2.org/ns/deployment-plan/maven2-deployment-plan-1.0.xsd" atomic="false" id="dp-example">
<deployment id="org.apache.geronimo.specs:geronimo-jms_1.1_spec:jar" xsi:type="m2:maven2-deploymentType" reloadable="false" start="true" reference="true" startlevel="1" starttransient="true"> <m2:groupId>org.apache.geronimo.specs</m2:groupId> <m2:artifactId>geronimo-jms_1.1_spec</m2:artifactId> <m2:version>1.1.1</m2:version> <m2:type>jar</m2:type> </deployment>
<deployment id="org.apache.geronimo.specs:geronimo-servlet_2.5_spec:jar" xsi:type="m2:maven2-deploymentType" reloadable="false" start="true" reference="true" startlevel="1" starttransient="true"> <m2:groupId>org.apache.geronimo.specs</m2:groupId> <m2:artifactId>geronimo-servlet_2.5_spec</m2:artifactId> <m2:version>1.2</m2:version> <m2:type>jar</m2:type> </deployment>
<deployment id="org.apache.commons:com.springsource.org.apache.commons.beanutils:jar" xsi:type="m2:maven2-deploymentType" reloadable="false" start="true" reference="true" startlevel="1" starttransient="true"> <m2:groupId>org.apache.commons</m2:groupId> <m2:artifactId>com.springsource.org.apache.commons.beanutils</m2:artifactId> <m2:version>1.8.3</m2:version> <m2:type>jar</m2:type> </deployment>
<deployment id="org.apache.commons:com.springsource.org.apache.commons.collections:jar" xsi:type="m2:maven2-deploymentType" reloadable="false" start="true" reference="true" startlevel="1" starttransient="true"> <m2:groupId>org.apache.commons</m2:groupId> <m2:artifactId>com.springsource.org.apache.commons.collections</m2:artifactId> <m2:version>3.2.1</m2:version> <m2:type>jar</m2:type> </deployment> ... </deployment-plan>
